title: Fragment, early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of large, elaborate pendants. Pattern outlined by cordonnet and interspersed by small, decorative openings.
